system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.YIIZnklXaHYDx9Iq]{Shotgun Specialist}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.gxasTv5lvZAfTOmR]{Close Combat Shotgunner}, and @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.8AUf1D5pyvrwlrb7]{Shotgun Ace} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.x7tLR5HfcbPS1xRy]{Shotgun Expert}

Benefits

When wielding a bolt, pump, lever, semi- or fully automatic shotgun, the Critical Threat range for any of these weapons is 15-18.

Normal

The Critical Threat range for all firearms is 16-18.

Special

If a character selects the Shotgun Master Feat, they may not select the Shotgun Savant Feat.
